about-me.title: Software Development Engineer,
about-me.description: Software developer with {{age}} years of age and experience in web and mobile application development. I specialize in creating functional and efficient solutions, and I am constantly looking for opportunities that allow me to keep learning, grow professionally and bring value to the projects in which I participate.

work1.title: Jr. Frontend Developer
work1.desc: Frontend Developer in <2>React Native</2> for an application to digitize the company's business process in all its points and departments.

work2.title: Jr Software Developer
work2.desc: Developer in software projects focused on Engineering and Quality departments for the digitization of processes in <1>SCADA Ignition</1> and data analysis with <1>SQL</1>

work3.title: Developer
work3.desc: I participated in the development of frontend and backend applications and components, contributing to several projects with <2>NextJs (react) and React native</2> technology.

work4.title: Intership, developer
work4.desc: Creation of web interface in <2>React</2> and development of backend integration developed in <2>Python</2> for web interface

one.title: Engineering in software development and management

two.title: Professional License in Mobile Services and Nomadic Interfaces

project1.title: Cocktail recipe finder
project1.description: Application developed in React that allows the user to search for cocktail recipes from the name of the drink or its ingredients. It uses an external API to display details such as ingredients, preparation instructions and an image of the cocktail.

project2.title: Temperature Finder
project2.description: React project that displays the current temperature and weather of a city entered by the user. It consumes a weather API (such as OpenWeatherMap) and presents data such as temperature, humidity and sky state in real time.

project3.title: Calorie Counter
project3.description: Interactive application built with React to calculate the calories consumed during the day. The user can add foods, assign calorie values to them and keep track of the daily total. Ideal for those who follow a diet or want to monitor their nutrition.

project4.title: Expense Control
project4.description: Tool developed with React to manage personal or family expenses. It allows you to set a budget, record expenses and visualize a graphical summary of the financial status. Useful to improve money management.
